articles.title: Watch: IndiGo Pilot Welcomes Wife On-Board With A Surprise Announcement - NDTV
articles.description: An IndiGo pilot is drawing a lot of praise on social media for showering his wife with love and affection aboard his flight. Captain Alneez Virani used the plane's public announcement system to say that he has the "privilege of flying my wife.
articles.content:
The video showed Zahra waving to Captain Virani from the tarmac.
